means: 被生染的，道地的，彻底的

sentence.Network_en: I like a dyed - in - the - wool killer. Cold - blooded, clean, methodical and thorough.
sentence.Network_cn: 我喜欢纯粹的杀手. 冷血, 干净, 办事有条理,彻底细致.

sentence.Network_en: That guy is more than stupid. He's a dyed - in - the - wool ignoramus.
sentence.Network_cn: 那家伙岂止愚蠢,他简直是彻底无知.

sentence.Network_en: He is a dyed - in - the - wool reactionary – there is no changing his opinions.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是 彻头彻尾 的反动分子——没法改变他的看法.

list.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... dyeability 可染性 dyed in the wool 彻底的 dyed-in-the-wool 彻底的.
一些汉语常用语的英文说法 ... 中途换人 change horse in midstream 彻头彻尾 dyed in the wool 公司开张 hold out one's shingle.

entry.tran: (信念、观念等)根深蒂固的,不易改变的
entry.def: If you use dyed-in-the-wool to describe someone or their beliefs, you are saying that they have very strong opinions about something, which they refuse to change.
